attributes.additional_details:
Now the BBC have lost most of Formula 1 in favour of BORING WIMBLEDON, musch cheaper and less watched.

Also the BBC is still biased towards Labour

Why shoud we pay a licence fee just to the BBC regardless of whether we watch it.

Let the BBC do adverts and cancel the licence fee for everybody, we pay enough to Sky who at least try to appeal to a true cross section af the community and all peoples interests.


The BBC is greedy and outdated , and self indulgent
